thread.section_title: Life Ionizers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Ionizers | lifeionizers.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: I really love this machine! It's been fantastic and works flawlessly! Water taste great, great for cooking, cut cost, and the customer service is awesome! The m13 x faucet is really cool and convenient too. How's all the functions for machine up top and accessible for use right away!! When I'm thirsty I just push my alkaline button and magic happens! I recommend this machine to anyone who wants to drink clean healthy water and cut cost down from those draining water companies!! Worth the investment!!
